name: UmbraFrost
description:
UmbraFrost is a small tower defense game, where you get stronger when you lose and become weaker when you win. Are you able to win 6 levels in a row?

---- Tutorial ----

Goal: Win 6 levels in a row.

Upgrades: Killing enemies gives you money, which you can spend in the shop for permanent upgrades.

Downgrades: You have to choose between 2 downgrades if you win a level, which only apply to the current run.

Controls: Mouse click for placing units

This game was made entirely by myself and was created from sratch for the WowieJam3.

This game is recommended to play in fullscreen.

I completely ran out of time, so there are no sounds.

Note: 

Exit button is not working.

There are some bugs with upgrades and downgrades.
